original: intros m x y. rename a into IHm. set (m1 := L m one x y). set (y0 := cA m zero y). intros Inv Hexp. set (MAX := MF.degree m x + MF.degree m y0). assert (HcF: Iter (cF m1) MAX x = x). ++ apply cF_L1_y0; try auto. apply MF.bij_f_1; auto. intro Hexpf. apply Hexp. apply expf_y0_y_1 with (m := m); try auto. -- rewrite MF.exd_f_1; auto. generalize (diff_x_x10 m x y (MF.degree m x)); intros Hcase. destruct Hcase as [H1 H2]. rewrite Nat.sub_1_r in H2. apply H1; auto. rewrite <- HcF. apply cF_L1_y0. auto. intro Hexpf. apply Hexpf. apply expf_L0_x0_y_0_1. apply HcF.
